thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 4 of 10
thread.title: Philippe

author: Philippe
title: Philippe
text: Everything was perfect (organisation: good food and lodging, nice and interesting guide, nice people involved, high interest, great beauty of the landscape, etc.), but for the return trip by coach: being also the driver, our guide was a bit too tired, after 3 days, to drive us safely for 6 hours from Uluru to Alice Springs. Thus, we were lucky not to have had an accident. Finally, the present review also has to do with working conditions!
